com.lukflug.panelstudio.layout

Class StackedPanelAdder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.layout.StackedPanelAdder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScrollSize, IComponentAdder

    public class StackedPanelAdder
extends java.lang.Object
implements IComponentAdder, IScrollSize
    Component adder that stacks component on top of each other in a single panel.
